name: Orbital Station - Midline (S)
desc:
A midline space station, featuring heavy firepower on one side and rapid axial rotation.

Must be reduced before a bombardment can be attempted.

name: Battlestation - Midline (S)
desc:
A space station, augmented with missile support modules.

Must be reduced before a bombardment can be attempted.

name: Star Fortress - Midline (S)
desc:
An up-armored battlestation, featuring Ravelin-class defense drones and an extensive minefield.

Must be reduced before a bombardment can be attempted.
